title: 18 Images From The Indian Air Force Day Parade Shows That We Are Ready To Take On Any Enemy
text:
Today is a proud day for all Indians because it's the IAF's 87th anniversary, and India will also receive the first Rafale jet into the Air Force at a handover ceremony in Merignac in France.

Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday hailed the role of the Indian Air Force in protecting the country during conflicts and helping people during natural calamities.

On the 87th Air Force Day, the prime minister posted a short video on his Twitter handle to highlight the contributions of "air warriors"

"Today, on Air Force Day, a proud nation expresses gratitude to our air warriors and their families. The Indian Air Force continues to serve India with utmost dedication and excellence," he said

Every year, the Air Force Day is celebrated at Hindon base in presence of the IAF chief and senior officials of the three armed forces

Don't Miss 331 SHARES 2.6 K SHARES 794 SHARES 562 SHARES 1.1 K SHARES

The IAF was founded on October 8, 1932, and the force has participated in several crucial wars and landmark missions.

Here are some images that will not only bring goosebumps but also make us feel proud and express gratitude to our air warriors.

#AFDay2019 : Promo video on the occasion of 87th Anniversary of Indian Air Force.

Watch the full video on : https://t.co/WyGyVrcXZy#AFDay19 pic.twitter.com/v2vlLA5Euh — Indian Air Force (@IAF_MCC) October 5, 2019

1. IAF Miraj 2000 fighters (front three) and Sukhoi jets (back L and R) fly past during the Air Force Day parade at an IAF station in Ghaziabad.

AFP

2. Sukhoi fighter jet flies past during the Air Force Day parade.

AFP

3. IAF Light Combat Aircraft Tejas flies past during the Air Force Day parade.

AFP

4. Indian Air Force's Sarang helicopters perform aerobatic stunts.

AFP

5. An Indian Air Force MIG 21 flies during Air Force Day parade.

AP

6. An Indian Air Force indigenous Tejas fighter plane flies during Air Force Day parade.

AP

7. Indian Air Force Surya Kiran fly in a formation during Air Force Day parade.

AP

8. Indian Air Force Sarang helicopters fly during Air Force Day parade.

AP

9. An Indian Air Force fighter plane Su- 30MKI releases flares as it flies.

AP

10. Indian Air Force fighter planes MIG 21 led by Wing Commander Abhinandan Varthaman.

AP

11. An Indian Air Force fighter plane Jaguar flies during Air Force Day parade.





AP

12. An Indian Air Force vintage plane Dakota flies flanked by two vayudoot aircrafts.

AP

13. An Indian Air Force plane C-17, center, flanked by Su 30MKI fly.

AP

14. Indian Air Force Apache attack helicopters fly by during Air Force Day parade.

AP

15. Newly inducted IAF the Boeing CH-47 Chinook flyes.

AFP

16. Members of Akash Ganga sky diving team of the Indian Air Force display their skill during Air Force Day parade.

AP

17. Air Warrior Drill team of Indian Air Force display their skills during Air Force Day parade.

AFP

18. Members of the Indian Air Force march during the Air Force Day parade.

AFP

Agency inputs
description: Today is a proud day for all Indians because it's the IAF's 87th birth anniversary, and today India will receive the first Rafale jet into the Air Force at a handover ceremony in Merignac in France. Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Tuesday hailed the role of the Indian Air Force in protecting the country during conflicts and helping people during natural calamities.
